items.title: Solstice was spun off from Honeywell in October. RBC is bullish on the stock's future
items.description: The bank upgraded the chemicals stock to outperform.

items.title: Here's what Trump's push into mortgage bonds could mean for income investors
items.description: The president recently directed Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac purchase $200 billion in agency mortgage-backed securities. Investors bought on the news.

items.title: These stocks are leading 'meaningful breakthroughs' in quantum computing, UBS says
items.description: Quantum computing is an industry with "extraordinary potential," according to UBS, which highlighted leading stocks.

items.title: Buffett’s pledge to give away 99% of his wealth could eventually test Berkshire’s shield against activists
items.description: Investors and analysts say the estate plan raises questions about how Berkshire will be governed once Buffett and his heirs' influence is diluted.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about these three stocks for the long term
items.description: TipRanks highlights three stocks, including Broadcom and Meta Platforms, favored by Wall Street pros.
